name: entr3i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c0, cen, c2)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c0, cen, c2)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c1)

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c2)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c1)
-| wbr(c2, cen, c0)

comment: A chained equinumerosity inference. (Contributed by NM, 25-Sep-2004.)
